meanings.definition: Feeling or showing gratitude or pleasure
meanings.sent1: She had an appreciatory smile on her face when she received the gift.
meanings.sent2: The audience's appreciatory applause filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent3: His appreciatory dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The appreciatory sun painted the sky with warm colors.
meanings.sent5: The appreciatory hug from her friend made her day brighter.

meanings.sent1: The appreciatory comments from the teacher boosted his confidence.
meanings.sent2: Her appreciatory tone in the speech resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The appreciatory cat purred happily at the compliment.
meanings.sent4: The appreciatory stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: His appreciatory nod showed his agreement with the decision.

meanings.definition: Relating to the act of recognizing the value or significance of something
meanings.sent1: The appreciatory gesture of returning the lost wallet was commendable.
meanings.sent2: The appreciatory look in her eyes conveyed her understanding of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The appreciatory dog wagged its tail at the sight of its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The appreciatory wind whispered secrets of the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: His appreciatory speech highlighted the importance of teamwork.
